name: bsaas-astro-website-template-for-startup-saas
title: bSaas Astro Template
desc: bSaaS is the ultimate Saas, startup website template built with Astro v4 and Tailwind CSS. With 10+ pre-built pages, you'll have a solid foundation to showcase your products or services effectively.
article:
Introducing bSaaS - A Sleek and Modern Website Template for SAAS, Startups & Businesses

we're excited to introduce bSaaS, a cutting-edge website template built with Astro v4 and Tailwind CSS. With its sleek and modern design, bSaaS is the perfect solution for businesses looking to create a stunning and functional website that showcases their brand and services.

bSaaS is a comprehensive website template designed to meet the needs of SAAS, startups, and businesses. With its robust feature set, you can create a professional website that effectively communicates your brand's message and values.


View Template on Web3Templates

Features

  • Sleek & Modern Design
  • Fully Responsive
  • 10+ Pre-built Pages
  • Component-Based Layout
  • Easy Customizations
  • Built with Astro v4
  • 100% Pure HTML & CSS Export
  • 99+ Pagespeed Score
  • SEO Optimized
  • Login & Signup Pages
  • Blog with Astro Content Collections
  • Built with Tailwind CSS
  • Google & Local Font Support
  • Figma Design File Included
  • Working Contact Form
  • Detailed Help Docs
  • 15000+ Satisfied Customers
  • 6 Months Support
  • Lifetime Updates


This template was built by Web3Templates using Astro and Tailwind CSS.
